item.title: My original intention for building a BLOG
item.description:
I don’t intend to be famous or what , I will definitely public all my stuffs on CSDN or Bilibili if I want to do so. So, I build my personal web basicly for recording beacause there is no site that contains all mixed blogs better than you own web.

But more importantly, it is an essay ,more accurately , a “recruitment ad” that inspired me for doing this website , and I highly recommend all “lost” or ambitious college students to read this one, for its enlightening me to do more meaningful things rather than pure rat race.

item.title: Universal PBC node-Matching abaqus script
item.description:
Traits

Specially designed for TPMS

  1. Automatically adapt to the constraint type of dian/bian/mian,
  2. no need to manually select set REALIZE THE AUTOMATION OF MIAN, DIAN, AND BIAN SETTINGS
  3. Solid/shell type support is supported in cases
  4. faces, edges, and points can be incomplete

Note

It is necessary to flip the cube to ensure the existence of the face edge point at the minimum value of the coordinate system

#--------------------------------------------------------------------------
#--------------------Applying the periodic boundary conditions-------------
#The script is run in the Abaqus CAE interface not command
#Tol parameter should be smaller than the element size.
#Input file of Abaqus should be provided to the script
#Notice that Partname/instancename/node sets should be assigned with the 
#following indicated name, e.g. Part-1,Part1-1,MIANX
#Make sure that the model with vertices have one of them on the corner
#-----------------Written by Guodong Fang, 12/03/2015, in Bristol----------
#-------------Modified by Yuqin Xiao ,10/24/2024 ,in ZheJiang--------------
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------
from abaqus import *
from math import *
from abaqusConstants import *
import string
import os
import math

raw_input_file=getInput("input the inp file name without the .inp:")
#raw_input_file='mix_model1'
#partname1= getInput("input part name:")
partname1='PART-1'
partname=string.upper(partname1)
instancename1='PART-1-1'
instancename=string.upper(instancename1)
file_path=(raw_input_file)+".inp"                           
mdb.ModelFromInputFile(inputFileName=file_path,name='Model-1')

p = mdb.models['Model-1'].parts[partname]
e = p.elements
n = p.nodes
Element_N = len(e)
print('=================================================================================')

element_initials = set()
with open(file_path, 'r') as file:
    for line in file:
        line_upper=line.upper()
        if line_upper.strip().startswith("*ELEMENT"):
            if "TYPE=" in line_upper:
                type_start = line_upper.find("TYPE=") + len("TYPE=")
                type_end = line_upper.find(",", type_start)
                if type_end == -1:  
                    type_end = len(line_upper)
                element_type = line_upper[type_start:type_end].strip()
                if element_type:  
                    element_initials.add(element_type[0])
if element_initials=={'C'}:
     Elemtype0=1
     print('Solid type')
elif element_initials=={'S'}:
     Elemtype0=2
     print('Shell type')
else:
     Elemtype0=0
     print('Not support')
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
node_index = []
node_z = []
node_x = []
node_y = []
nlabel = []

tol=1e-1



for nod in n:
	nx = nod.coordinates[0]
	ny = nod.coordinates[1]
	nz = nod.coordinates[2]
	node_x.append(nx)
	node_y.append(ny)
	node_z.append(nz)
	nlabel.append(nod.label)

xp0 = max(node_x)
xn0 = min(node_x)
yp0 = max(node_y)
yn0 = min(node_y)
zp0 = max(node_z)
zn0 = min(node_z)
           
for nod in n:
	nx = nod.coordinates[0]
	ny = nod.coordinates[1]
	nz = nod.coordinates[2]


wx=  xp0 - xn0
wy = yp0 - yn0
wz = zp0 - zn0

centerx=(xp0 + xn0)/2
centery=(yp0 + yn0)/2
centerz=(zp0 + zn0)/2

print 'Outer Cube',
print (wx,wy,wz)

varnxn = []
varnxp = []
varnyn = []
varnyp = []
varnzn = []
varnzp = []
varnbx = []
varnbxy = []
varnbxz = []
varnbxyz = []
varnby = []
varnbyx = []
varnbyz = []
varnbyxz = []
varnbz = []
varnbzx = []
varnbzy = []
varnbzxy = []
varnd= []
varndx= []
varndy= []
varndz= []
varndxy= []
varndxz= []
varndyz= []
varndxyz= []
varn_all=[]
type0=0

nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xn0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yn0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zn0+tol)
if nnn:
    type0=7 #VERTICES ONLY
    varnd.append(nnn[0].label)
    xx0 = n[varnd[0]].coordinates[0]
    yy0 = n[varnd[0]].coordinates[1]
    zz0 = n[varnd[0]].coordinates[2]	
    nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)	
    if nnn:
        varndx.append(nnn[0].label)
    nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)	
    if nnn:
        varndy.append(nnn[0].label)
    nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)	
    if nnn:
        varndz.append(nnn[0].label)
    nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)	
    if nnn:
        varndxz.append(nnn[0].label)
    nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)	
    if nnn:
        varndxy.append(nnn[0].label)
    nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)	
    if nnn:
        varndyz.append(nnn[0].label)
    nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)	
    if nnn:
        varndxyz.append(nnn[0].label)
    varn_all=varnd+varndx+varndy+varndz+varndxz+varndxy+varndyz+varndxyz


bx_min=10000
by_min=10000
bz_min=10000


nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xp0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yn0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zn0+tol)
for eachn in nnn:	
    varnbx.append(eachn.label)
varnbx=[item for item in varnbx if item not in varn_all]
if varnbx:
     for ii in varnbx:
         jj = nlabel.index(ii)
         xx0 = n[jj].coordinates[0]
         yy0 = n[jj].coordinates[1]
         zz0 = n[jj].coordinates[2]
         if xx0<bx_min:
             bx_min=xx0
         nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)
         if nnn:
             varnbxy.append(nnn[0].label)
         nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)
         if nnn:
             varnbxz.append(nnn[0].label)
         nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)
         if nnn:
             varnbxyz.append(nnn[0].label)



nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xn0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yp0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zn0+tol)
for eachn in nnn:	
    varnby.append(eachn.label)
varnby=[item for item in varnby if item not in varn_all]
if varnby:	
    for ii in varnby:
         jj = nlabel.index(ii)
         xx0 = n[jj].coordinates[0]
         yy0 = n[jj].coordinates[1]
         zz0 = n[jj].coordinates[2]		
         if yy0<by_min:
             by_min=yy0	
         nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)		
         if nnn:
             varnbyx.append(nnn[0].label)
         nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)	
         if nnn:
             varnbyz.append(nnn[0].label)
         nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)	
         if nnn:
             varnbyxz.append(nnn[0].label)

nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xn0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yn0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zp0+tol)
for eachn in nnn:	
    varnbz.append(eachn.label)
varnbz=[item for item in varnbz if item not in varn_all]
if varnbz:	
    for ii in varnbz:
        jj = nlabel.index(ii)
        xx0 = n[jj].coordinates[0]
        yy0 = n[jj].coordinates[1]
        zz0 = n[jj].coordinates[2]
        if zz0<bz_min:
             bz_min=zz0	
        nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)
        if nnn:
            varnbzx.append(nnn[0].label)
        nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)
        if nnn:
            varnbzy.append(nnn[0].label)
        nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)
        if nnn:
            varnbzxy.append(nnn[0].label)

varn_all+=varnbx+varnbxy+varnbxz+varnbxyz+varnby+varnbyx+varnbyz+varnbyxz+varnbz+varnbzx+varnbzy+varnbzxy

if varnbx or varnby or varnbz:
    if type0==7:
         type0=4 #VERTICES+EDGES
    else:
         type0=6 #EDGES ONLY


dis_max_x=0
dis_max_y=0
dis_max_z=0

nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xn0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yp0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zp0+tol)
for eachn in nnn:
    varnxn.append(eachn.label)
varnxn = [item for item in varnxn if not (item in varn_all )]
if varnxn:
    for ii in varnxn:
        jj = nlabel.index(ii)
        xx0 = n[jj].coordinates[0]
        yy0 = n[jj].coordinates[1]
        zz0 = n[jj].coordinates[2]		
        if (yy0-centery)**2+(xx0-centerx)**2+(zz0-centerz)**2>dis_max_x:
            dis_max_x=(yy0-centery)**2+(xx0-centerx)**2+(zz0-centerz)**2
            dis_max_x_y=yy0
            dis_max_x_z=zz0
        nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0+wx-tol, xMax=xx0+wx+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)	
        varnxp.append(nnn[0].label)

nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xp0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yn0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zp0+tol)
for eachn in nnn:
    varnyn.append(eachn.label)
varnyn = [item for item in varnyn if not (item in varn_all )]
if varnyn:
    for ii in varnyn:
        jj = nlabel.index(ii)
        xx0 = n[jj].coordinates[0]
        yy0 = n[jj].coordinates[1]
        zz0 = n[jj].coordinates[2]		
        if (yy0-centery)**2+(xx0-centerx)**2+(zz0-centerz)**2>dis_max_y:
            dis_max_y=(yy0-centery)**2+(xx0-centerx)**2+(zz0-centerz)**2
            dis_max_y_x=xx0
            dis_max_y_z=zz0
        nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0+wy-tol, yMax=yy0+wy+tol, zMin=zz0-tol, zMax=zz0+tol)	
        varnyp.append(nnn[0].label)
		
nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xp0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yp0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zn0+tol)
for eachn in nnn:
    varnzn.append(eachn.label)
varnzn = [item for item in varnzn if not (item in varn_all)]
if varnzn:
    for ii in varnzn:
        jj = nlabel.index(ii)
        xx0 = n[jj].coordinates[0]
        yy0 = n[jj].coordinates[1]
        zz0 = n[jj].coordinates[2]		
        if (yy0-centery)**2+(xx0-centerx)**2+(zz0-centerz)**2>dis_max_z:
            dis_max_z=(yy0-centery)**2+(xx0-centerx)**2+(zz0-centerz)**2
            dis_max_z_x=xx0
            dis_max_z_y=yy0
        nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xx0-tol, xMax=xx0+tol, yMin=yy0-tol, yMax=yy0+tol, zMin=zz0+wz-tol, zMax=zz0+wz+tol)	
        varnzp.append(nnn[0].label)

if varnxn or varnyn or varnzn:
    if type0==7:
          type0=2 #VERTICES+FACES
    elif type0==6:
          type0=3 #EDGES+FACES
    elif type0==4:
         type0=1 #VERTICES+EDGES+FACES
    elif type0==0:
          type0==5

if type0==1:
    print "type= MIAN+BIAN+DIAN"
if type0==2:
    print "type= MIAN+DIAN"
if type0==3:
    print "type= MIAN+BIAN"
if type0==4:
    print "type= BIAN+DIAN"
if type0==5:
    print "type= MIAN"
if type0==6:
    print "type= BIAN"
if type0==7:
    print "type= DIAN"
    
    
# define the vertices
if type0==1 or type0==2 or type0==4 or type0==7:
     nnn=varnd[0]
elif type0==3 or type0==6:
    if varnbz:
          nnn= n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xn0+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yn0+tol, zMin=bz_min-tol, zMax=bz_min+tol)
    elif varnby:
          nnn= n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xn0+tol, yMin=by_min-tol, yMax=by_min+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zn0+tol)
    elif varnbx:
          nnn= n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=bx_min-tol, xMax=bx_min+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yn0+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zn0+tol)
elif type==5:
    if varnxn:
          nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=xn0-tol, xMax=xn0+tol, yMin=dis_max_x_y-tol, yMax=dis_max_x_y+tol, zMin=dis_max_x_z-tol, zMax=dis_max_x_z+tol)
    elif varnyn:
          nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=dis_max_y_x-tol, xMax=dis_max_y_x+tol, yMin=yn0-tol, yMax=yn0+tol, zMin=dis_max_y_z-tol, zMax=dis_max_y_z+tol)
    elif varnzn:
          nnn = n.getByBoundingBox(xMin=dis_max_z_x-tol, xMax=dis_max_z_x+tol, yMin=dis_max_z_y-tol, yMax=dis_max_z_y+tol, zMin=zn0-tol, zMax=zn0+tol)
          
R = nnn
print "R.index=",
print(R)


resultname=raw_input_file+'_node'+'.dat'
f=open(resultname,'w')
f.write("*Node, nset=Refx")
f.write("\n")
temp = str(n[-1].label+1)+','+str(nx)+','+str(ny)+','+str(nz)
f.write(temp)
f.write("\n")
f.write("*Node, nset=Refy")
f.write("\n")
temp = str(n[-1].label+2)+','+str(nx)+','+str(ny)+','+str(nz)
f.write(temp)
f.write("\n")
f.write("*Node, nset=Refz")
f.write("\n")
temp = str(n[-1].label+3)+','+str(nx)+','+str(ny)+','+str(nz)
f.write(temp)
f.write("\n")
f.write("*Node, nset=Refxy")
f.write("\n")
temp = str(n[-1].label+4)+','+str(nx)+','+str(ny)+','+str(nz)
f.write(temp)
f.write("\n")
f.write("*Node, nset=Refyz")
f.write("\n")
temp = str(n[-1].label+5)+','+str(nx)+','+str(ny)+','+str(nz)
f.write(temp)
f.write("\n")
f.write("*Node, nset=Refxz")
f.write("\n")
temp = str(n[-1].label+6)+','+str(nx)+','+str(ny)+','+str(nz)
f.write(temp)
f.write("\n")
f.write(str("*Nset, nset=R, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
f.write(str(R))
f.write(',')
f.write("\n")
if type0==1 or type0==2 or type0==3 or type0==5:
      if varnxn:
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=x0, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnxn)):
                f.write(str(varnxn[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=x1, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnxp)):
                f.write(str(varnxp[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
      if varnyn:
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=y0, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnyn)):
                f.write(str(varnyn[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=y1, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnyp)):
                f.write(str(varnyp[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
      if varnzn:
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=z0, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnzn)):
                f.write(str(varnzn[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=z1, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnzp)):
                f.write(str(varnzp[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")

if type0==1 or type0==3 or type0==4 or type0==6:
      if varnbx:
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bx, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbx)):
                f.write(str(varnbx[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")	    
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bxy, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbxy)):
                f.write(str(varnbxy[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bxz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbxz)):
                f.write(str(varnbxz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bxyz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbxyz)):
                f.write(str(varnbxyz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
      if varnby:
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=by, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnby)):
                f.write(str(varnby[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=byx, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbyx)):
                f.write(str(varnbyx[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=byz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbyz)):
                f.write(str(varnbyz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=byxz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbyxz)):
                f.write(str(varnbyxz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
      if varnbz:
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbz)):
                f.write(str(varnbz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bzx, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbzx)):
                f.write(str(varnbzx[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bzy, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbzy)):
                f.write(str(varnbzy[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=bzxy, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnbzxy)):
                f.write(str(varnbzxy[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
if type0==1 or type0==2 or type0==4 or type0==7:
       if varnd:
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=d, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varnd)):
                f.write(str(varnd[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=dxyz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varndxyz)):
                f.write(str(varndxyz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
       if varndx:  
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=dx, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varndx)):
                f.write(str(varndx[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=dyz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varndyz)):
                f.write(str(varndyz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
       if varndy:  
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=dy, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varndy)):
                f.write(str(varndy[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=dxz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varndxz)):
                f.write(str(varndxz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
       if varndz:           
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=dz, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varndz)):
                f.write(str(varndz[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")
            f.write(str("*Nset, nset=dxy, unsorted, instance=")+str(instancename)+'\n')
            for i in range(len(varndxy)):
                f.write(str(varndxy[i]))
                f.write(',')
                if (i+1)%10==0:
                    f.write("\n")
            f.write("\n")

#---------------------------------------------------------------------
f.write("**=====================================================================================\n")
f.write("*equation"+"\n")
if type0==1 or type0==2 or type0==3 or type0==5:
      if varnxn:#  x1-x0   
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("x1,1,1.0,x0,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("x1,2,1.0,x0,2,-1.0"+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("x1,3,1.0,x0,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("x1,4,1.0,x0,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("x1,5,1.0,x0,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("x1,6,1.0,x0,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnyn:# y1-y0    
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("y1,1,1.0,y0,1,-1.0,Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("y1,2,1.0,y0,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")    
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("y1,3,1.0,y0,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("y1,4,1.0,y0,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("y1,5,1.0,y0,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("y1,6,1.0,y0,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnzn:# z1-z0    
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("z1,1,1.0,z0,1,-1.0,Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("z1,2,1.0,z0,2,-1.0,Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("z1,3,1.0,z0,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("z1,4,1.0,z0,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("z1,5,1.0,z0,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("z1,6,1.0,z0,6,-1.0"+"\n")
if type0==1 or type0==3 or type0==4 or type0==6:
      if varnbxy:# xb   
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxy,1,1.0,bx,1,-1.0,Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxy,2,1.0,bx,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxy,3,1.0,bx,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxy,4,1.0,bx,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxy,5,1.0,bx,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxy,6,1.0,bx,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbxyz:
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxyz,1,1.0,bx,1,-1.0,Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+",Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxyz,2,1.0,bx,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+",Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxyz,3,1.0,bx,3,-1.0"+",Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxyz,4,1.0,bx,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxyz,5,1.0,bx,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxyz,6,1.0,bx,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbxz:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxz,1,1.0,bx,1,-1.0,Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxz,2,1.0,bx,2,-1.0,Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bxz,3,1.0,bx,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxz,4,1.0,bx,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxz,5,1.0,bx,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bxz,6,1.0,bx,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbyx:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("byx,1,1.0,by,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("byx,2,1.0,by,2,-1.0"+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("byx,3,1.0,by,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byx,4,1.0,by,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byx,5,1.0,by,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byx,6,1.0,by,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbyxz:
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("byxz,1,1.0,by,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+",Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("byxz,2,1.0,by,2,-1.0,Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("byxz,3,1.0,by,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byxz,4,1.0,by,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byxz,5,1.0,by,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byxz,6,1.0,by,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbyz:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("byz,1,1.0,by,1,-1.0,Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("byz,2,1.0,by,2,-1.0,Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("byz,3,1.0,by,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byz,4,1.0,by,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byz,5,1.0,by,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("byz,6,1.0,by,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbzx:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzx,1,1.0,bz,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzx,2,1.0,bz,2,-1.0"+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzx,3,1.0,bz,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzx,4,1.0,bz,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzx,5,1.0,bz,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzx,6,1.0,bz,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbzxy:
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzxy,1,1.0,bz,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+",Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzxy,2,1.0,bz,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzxy,3,1.0,bz,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzxy,4,1.0,bz,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzxy,5,1.0,bz,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzxy,6,1.0,bz,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varnbzy:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzy,1,1.0,bz,1,-1.0,Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzy,2,1.0,bz,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("bzy,3,1.0,bz,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzy,4,1.0,bz,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzy,5,1.0,bz,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("bzy,6,1.0,bz,6,-1.0"+"\n")


#dian
if type0==1 or type0==2 or type0==4 or type0==7:
      if varndx:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dx,1,1.0,d,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("dx,2,1.0,d,2,-1.0"+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("dx,3,1.0,d,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dx,4,1.0,d,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dx,5,1.0,d,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dx,6,1.0,d,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varndy:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dy,1,1.0,d,1,-1.0,Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dy,2,1.0,d,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("2,"+"\n")
            f.write("dy,3,1.0,d,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dy,4,1.0,d,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dy,5,1.0,d,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dy,6,1.0,d,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varndz:
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dz,1,1.0,d,1,-1.0,Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dz,2,1.0,d,2,-1.0,Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dz,3,1.0,d,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dz,4,1.0,d,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dz,5,1.0,d,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dz,6,1.0,d,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varndxz:
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxz,1,1.0,d,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+",Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxz,2,1.0,d,2,-1.0,Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxz,3,1.0,d,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxz,4,1.0,d,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxz,5,1.0,d,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxz,6,1.0,d,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varndxyz:
            f.write("5,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxyz,1,1.0,d,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+",Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+","+"\n")
            f.write("Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxyz,2,1.0,d,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+",Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxyz,3,1.0,d,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxyz,4,1.0,d,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxyz,5,1.0,d,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxyz,6,1.0,d,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varndyz:
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("dyz,1,1.0,d,1,-1.0,Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+",Refxz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("dyz,2,1.0,d,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+",Refyz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dyz,3,1.0,d,3,-1.0,Refz,1,-"+str(wz)+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dyz,4,1.0,d,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dyz,5,1.0,d,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dyz,6,1.0,d,6,-1.0"+"\n")
      if varndxy:
            f.write("4,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxy,1,1.0,d,1,-1.0,Refx,1,-"+str(wx)+",Refxy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxy,2,1.0,d,2,-1.0,Refy,1,-"+str(wy)+"\n")
            f.write("3,"+"\n")
            f.write("dxy,3,1.0,d,3,-1.0"+"\n")
            if Elemtype0==2:
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxy,4,1.0,d,4,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxy,5,1.0,d,5,-1.0"+"\n")
                    f.write("2,"+"\n")
                    f.write("dxy,6,1.0,d,6,-1.0"+"\n")
f.close()
print('Complete!')
print('=================================================================================')

item.title: Meshing tricks for TPMS
item.description:
要处理类似极小曲面（TPMS）这样的异形曲面，可能会产生一些网格划分上的问题，例如，曲面生成的如果不够光滑，在划分网格时会产生小细线、小面片，通常情况下网格质量不会特别好。以下是我自己找到的一套处理方法，欢迎讨论、优化：

对异形曲面参数化建模时，建立更光滑的曲面

例如我用mathematica建模，就是选取更多的PlotPoints

1.使用Magics进行三角面片简化/细化光滑/重画网格

这一步使用的是软件里的功能先傻瓜操作，对曲面质量做一个初步的提升，如果曲面质量还可以可以忽略这一步（讲道理只要是专门处理stl的软件都会有这个功能也不一定要用magics）

2.在hypermesh当中，先根据导入的stl文件建立surface，再对这个surface进行automesh操作，初步得到网格，如果发现质量好就可以直接导出

3.检查网格问题，对存在问题进行修补删除

注意网格划分时候的边界情况，如果有很多小细线，需要在quick edit–toogle lines进行处理；

如果遇到质量很差的多小面片：

————————————————

方案一：检查网格的质量，使用check elem–点选各个检查特征值–save failed–delete–retrieve–delete entity 方法参考https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Mh4y117nQ/?spm_id_from=333.337.search-card.all.click&vd_source=6ed4355279e79869f34ed924af694b1d

方案二：replace合并节点

方案三：直接选中小面片delete

方案四：局部重新划分

方案五：edit elem–create 修补网格，之后重新划分

以下是实操视频，由于第一遍就已经产生质量不错的网格，所以只简单展示了一下方案一 https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1niCUYREi2/?vd_source=6ed4355279e79869f34ed924af694b1d

————————————————

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide & Math Typesetting
item.description:
Markdown Syntax Guide

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
